articles.author: David Axe
articles.title: Ukraine's American-Made M39 Missiles May Have Wrecked 21 Russian Helicopters In A Single Operation - Forbes
articles.description: The M39 raid put out of action 21 helicopters, according to an analysis of commercial satellite imagery by GeoConfirmed, an open-source intelligence practioner.
articles.content:
Submunition damage to a Russian helicopter.
Via social media
The damage from Ukraines first-ever strike with American-supplied M39 missiles, targeting a pair of helicopter bases in Russian-occupied… [+3706 chars]
